name: A ruby necklace with a blue crystal embedded in it
data: It decreases the users strength a bit.
It decreases the users dexterity a bit.
It increases the users wisdom somewhat.
It increases the users intelligence poorly.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impressively.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers fast.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'quick chant'.
